price: |Yeroo Muusaaf kitaaba (Tawraatii)fi seera adda babaasaa dhugaafi kijibaa akka isin qajeeltaniif jecha kennines [yaadadhaa].
arabic: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wal-fur'qāna laʿallakum tahtadūna
